casebody.data:
U.S. BANK TRUST, N.A., AS TRUSTEE FOR LSF9 MASTER PARTICIPATION TRUST, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Mrs. Edwin P. GANT, His Wife, and State of New Jersey, Defendants,
and
Edwin P. Gant, Defendant/Third-Party Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
Maverick Funding Corp. and U.S. Bank Trust, N.A., as Trustee for LSF9 Master Participation Trust, Third-Party Defendants,
and
Citi Mortgage, Inc., Third-Party Defendant. C-380 September Term 2018
081477 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 17, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000696-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
